vlive.korean: [(미안함에 음소거 미소)] 소 잃고 외양간을 잃으면 뭘 얻는데? [I'm sorry] What do you get if you lose a cow and a barn? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [I'm sorry] What do you get if you lose a cow and a barn?

vlive.korean: 재료 얻는데만 40분이 걸렸네요. -그러게요. It took us 40 minutes to pick ingredients. - I know. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : VAV - Very Awesome VAV '우리 모두 함께 할 때가 가장 행복해요!'
vlive.english: It took us 40 minutes to pick ingredients. - I know.

vlive.korean: [소 잃고 외양간 득템] 교훈을 얻는 게 없잖아! [You lose a cow, and get a barn] There's no lesson. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [You lose a cow, and get a barn] There's no lesson.
